flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: For this project you will need a blender, a quick read thermometer, some recycled jars or tupperware and 4 simple ingredients: coconut oil, olive oil, beeswax and borax. A double boiler would help as well. This project is fairly easy, but can be a bit messy.
guide.introduction_rendered: For this project you will need a blender, a quick read thermometer, some recycled jars or tupperware and 4 simple ingredients: coconut oil, olive oil, beeswax and borax. A double boiler would help as well. This project is fairly easy, but can be a bit messy.
guide.summary: Make rich and moisturizing hand and body cream at home using ingredients found in most grocery stores. There's no need to rely on overly packaged and marketed creams from the store: make your own for a fraction of the cost, and keep the land fills leaner.
guide.title: All Natural Body/Hand Lotion - Tutorial
